value:
An ambush would be a good trick to
play on someone... But where should
I hide?$k$pHuh? You overheard me just now?
I meant, um...a friendly ambush.

I've visited a lot of countries in my
time as a mercenary. And no matter
where I go, festivals are always fun!

This outfit isn't too much, is it? Well,
if you think it's perfect for the
festival, then let's get witchin'!

Hey, don't hold back! This candy
isn't going to eat itself, boss. Have
another handful! Let loose a little!

I don't ever skip a training session.
Especially when it comes to keeping
this broomstick steady!$k$pAlmost took a nasty tumble my first
few times out.

I'm under direct orders to enjoy the
festival! Want to join me and your
friend $Nf?

Ha! I'm doing so well today. I feel like
I could conquer anything!

I haven't reached the top yet...
The fun's just getting started!

Maybe I was distracted by all the
candy... I need to refocus!
Let's keep the festival going!

Is it a trick or a treat? Only you can
determine your fate! Oh, I'm Mia, by
the way. I'm a mercenary.

People often ask me why a girl is out
on the battlefield. Can you believe
that?$k$pI tell them that underestimating my
skills can be hazardous to their
health!$k$pOnce they see me in action, they
understand I can fight as well as any
soldier out there. If not better!$k$pBut I just know I'll get that question
again before the next battle.$k$pThat's why I like festivals like these. It
doesn't matter whether you're a boy
or girl, old or young.$k$pEveryone just accepts that you're
here to have fun!$k$pWhether you're playing a trick,
being tricked, or just eating candy,
you can't help but smile through it all.$k$pWell, anyway, festivals like these
don't happen everyday. So let's get
out there and enjoy ourselves!$k$pCome on, boss, you're with me!
せやぁっ！
ほらよっと
きゃああっ！
あれぇっ！？
That candy's mine!
Trick or treat!
Got a trick for ya!
Don't let the outfit fool ya!
Stupid costume…
あはー
Hey, it's all good!
Keep it up!
So what do you think? Pretty cool costume, right?
Bwaaah! Aw, c'mon! Gosh, I thought you were a ghost sneaking up on me...
Are you here for candy? Uh, wait... Where did I put it again?
I'm always training. Gotta watch the candy intake!
Candy for me? Thanks, Boss! Ya know, you're really kind. I like it!
Nice.
Alrighty then!
Who should I prank?
